column1: The Seven Hoards of the Dwarf-kings were legendary treasures of the Dwarves. The name suggests that each hoard belonged to one of the :Category:Dwarven clans. As it is said
column2: the foundation of each was a golden ring
column3: and probably they were gathered thanks to the Seven Rings given to the Dwarves by Sauron in the Second Age.

column2: but it is not known if they were two of the Seven Hoards.
